title: Propose IoTeX Integration into MCN Multifarm Ecosystem
body:
IoTeX is an emerging chain that is focused to power billions of devices and decentralized applications across the physical and digital world.

IoTeX’s mission is to enable a borderless ecosystem where humans and machines can interact with guaranteed trust, free will, and privacy. IoTeX envisions a future where users, not institutions, are in complete control of their devices and data. IoTeX calls this vision the Internet of Trusted Things.

Thus, MCN proposes IoTeX to be integrated into MCN Multifarm Ecosystem as a key resource for the emerging chain ecosystem with a unique value proposition in the blockchain IoT applications. MCN believes this is a win-win situation for both IoTeX and MCN as both are long-term key players that will empower each others' vision as a multi-chain ecosystem connecting the physical and blockchain world.
author: 0x7fA12C4B388732411Cb92ea5BB1237f0520eBc53
